featured.text: Women have been found to ask more questions, make more use of positive and encouraging “noises,” use a wider range of intonation patterns, and make greater use of the pronouns “you” and “we.”

definition.zh_def: 語調；聲調的變化，特別是在語言中用來表達情感或語氣的音高變化。
definition.en_def: The rise and fall in the pitch of the voice while speaking, used to convey meaning or emotion.
definition.example: Her intonation changed when she asked the question, indicating she was unsure.
